sources.title: Nana 2 (2006)
sources.description: Romance develops between Hachi and TRAPNEST's bassist Takumi as well as with the Black Stones' guitarist Nobu. Meanwhile, Nana works hard for her band while trying to find happiness. Both girls struggle through life, and try to keep their friendship from falling apart. ~~ Adapted from the manga 'Nana' (ナナ) by Ai Yazawa.

metadata.Plot: Nana and Nana begin together, but drift apart due to the men in their lives. When Nana 'Hachiko' is forced into making the only choice that makes sense to her she hurts her boyfriend whom she leaves behind. In the meanwhile, Black Stones have a record deal and surge in popularity to rival Trapnest.
metadata.Actors: Mika Nakashima, Yui Ichikawa, Tetsuji Tamayama
